named-query.name: Teacher.getByUsername
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM Teacher t JOIN FETCH t.role JOIN FETCH t.personInformation JOIN FETCH t.address WHERE t.username = :username

named-query.name: Teacher.getByPesel
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM Teacher t JOIN FETCH t.role JOIN FETCH t.personInformation pi WHERE pi.pesel = :pesel

named-query.name: Teacher.getByEmail
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM Teacher t WHERE t.email = :email
